document.full_text: pieces of the chugwater soda fountain have drifted in over the years and stayed put, like many of the people and things in a town of 244, just north of cheyenne.
document.title: out here | chugwater, wyo.: a soda fountain where artifacts tend to drift in. (the customers, too.)
lines_and_colors: pieces of the chugwater soda fountain have drifted in over the years and stayed put, like many of the people and things in a town of 244, just north of cheyenne.
